text: Kandi (abahakanyi) bageneye Allah umugabane mu bihingwa n’amatungo yaremye, nuko bakavuga bati "Ibi ni ibya Allah -mu kwibwira kwabo-, naho ibi ni iby’ibigirwamana byacu". Ariko ibyo bageneye ibigirwamana byabo ntibigera kwa Allah, naho ibyo bageneye Allahbyo bikagera ku bigirwamana byabo. (Rwose) ibyo bibwira ni bibi
